idioms.meaning: all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth

idioms.reading: しゃりんのさいはつめい

lessons.japanese: 金より銀の指輪の方が好きです。
lessons.indonesian: I prefer silver rings to gold ones.

lessons.japanese: 一輪車は車輪がひとつしかありません。
lessons.indonesian: A unicycle has only one wheel.
You must not part with the ring.

lessons.japanese: 指輪はどこにも見つからなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The ring was nowhere to be found.
